thread.title: What's Open, What's Closed August Civic Holiday
thread.title_full: What's Open, What's Closed August Civic Holiday

title: What's Open, What's Closed August Civic Holiday
text:
August Long Weekend | Holidays in Canada | August in Canada 
In 2014, the August Civic Holiday is Monday, August 4. 
Most stores and services that would normally be open on a weekend will operate on the Monday August Civic Holiday. 
Stores and services operate as usual on the Saturday and Sunday of this long weekend. 
Not all provinces observe an August Civic Holiday. Quebec, Newfoundland and Nunavut do not have an August Civic Holiday and therefore conduct business as usual. 
For the provinces that have a civic holiday, here is an overview of openings and closures (may vary slightly by location - call ahead to confirm). Closed on Monday, August 4, 2014 Banks
